name: logout
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of logging out of a computer system (= stopping being connected to it): There are files that keep track of all logins and logouts to the system. Clients become unavailable if the screen locks during logout. Opposite
login
More examplesFewer examplesA simple logout and re-login should present you with the option to revert to the previous user interface.Session Management helps to manage the logout and login of the Session Manager.You'll see both the login and logout date and time along with the amount of time the account was logged in.A small information window should load onto your screen with your cards details and a log-out button.
